summary: SummaryWith gentle T-Sonic™ pulsations and ultra-hygienic silicone bristles, LUNA™ 4 Play effortlessly removes oil, makeup, sweat, and SPF from deep within your pores. It's the ultimate way to elevate your daily cleanse, leaving your skin feeling fresh and rejuvenated with every use.
details: DetailsBenefitsClinically proven to remove 99% of dirt, oil, sweat and make-up residueMassages skin for a smooth, glowing complexionImproves lymphatic drainage for naturally defined contoursPreps skin to enhance the absorption of skincare productsFeatures8 adjustable intensities for a perfectly tailored cleanse2-zone brush head for deep precision cleansing8,000 pulsations per minute for deep and effective cleansing100% waterproof and bacteria-resistantErgonomic and lightweight, with up to 300 uses per USB charge35x more hygienic than nylon facial cleansing brushesVelvety soft silicone design to glide effortlessly over skinHypoallergenic, free of phthalates and BPACustomizable, with no replacement parts needed – everIncludesLUNA™ 4 playUSB Charging CableUser ManualItem 2643128How To UseBefore first use, download the FOREO For You app to unlock and register your device, and activate the warranty. Apply your facial cleanser evenly over damp face and neck. For optimal results, we recommend FOREO Micro-Foam Cleanser, designed to create microbubbles that pair perfectly with LUNA™ devices for a gentle, effective cleanse. Wet LUNA™ 4 play, press the universal button to turn on, adjust the intensity, and glide the device in circular motions over your face and neck for up to 1 minute or until your skin is cleansed. When finished, press the universal button to turn off LUNA™ 4 play (it will also automatically turn off after 1 minute). Rinse your face and neck, and clean the device.TIP: You can customize your device to your preferences on the FOREO app.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Before first use, download the FOREO For You app to unlock and register your device, and activate the warranty. Apply your facial cleanser evenly over damp face and neck. For optimal results, we recommend FOREO Micro-Foam Cleanser, designed to create microbubbles that pair perfectly with LUNA™ devices for a gentle, effective cleanse. Wet LUNA™ 4 play, press the universal button to turn on, adjust the intensity, and glide the device in circular motions over your face and neck for up to 1 minute or until your skin is cleansed. When finished, press the universal button to turn off LUNA™ 4 play (it will also automatically turn off after 1 minute). Rinse your face and neck, and clean the device.TIP: You can customize your device to your preferences on the FOREO app.
